comment.body: Does the mannal method work for window OS? I have installed python on my PC.

> [nofish](#comment_202_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): For windows users you have to use ZeroNet.cmd in the lib directory, so: lib\zeronet.cmd siteSign [yoursiteaddress] --inner_path data/users/content.json

thanks
